# PED::SET_TREAT_AS_AMBIENT_PED_FOR_DRIVER_LOCKON

## Summary
Treats ped as ambient ped for driver lock on tests (e.g. mission peds we don't want to lock on to)

## Parameters
* **PED_INDEX** ped
* **BOOL** treatAsAmbientPed
